# eudract

The goal of eudract is to provide tools to easily produce summaris of safety data from clinical trials that can easily be uploaded into eudraCT. 

## Installation

You can install the github version of eudract with:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("shug0131/eudraCT/R/eudract")
```

## Example

Go and read the help pages

```{r example}
?eudract::safety_summary
```
